characters: Driver of a beige sedan, cyclist, pedestrians
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban intersection. A beige sedan is ahead, moving to the right lane. A cyclist is crossing from the left side, and several pedestrians are walking on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the beige sedan ahead and is cautious of the cyclist crossing from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A beige sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving to the right lane. 2) Left: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the intersection. 3) Right: Several pedestrians, approximately 8 meters away, walking on the right side of the road.
